          <title>
            <string language="en">Light reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion légère</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão clara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione chiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά αντανάκλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión ligera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a prism periscope, mirror periscope, dental mirror, magnifying glass and fibre optic cable.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fibre optic cable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnifying glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror periscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prism periscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">total internal reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Prisma Periscope, 
einen Spiegel Periscope, einen zahnmedizinischen Spiegel, ein 
Vergrößerungsglas und ein fiberoptisches Kabel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un périscope de 
prisme, un périscope de miroir, un miroir dentaire, une loupe et un 
câble à fibres optiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um periscope de prisma, 
um periscope do espelho, um espelho dental, um vidro ampliando e um 
cabo ótico da fibra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un periscope del 
prisma, un periscope dello specchio, uno specchio dentale, una lente 
d'ingrandimento e un cavo ottico della fibra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα περισκόπιο 
πρισμάτων, ένα περισκόπιο καθρεφτών, έναν οδοντικό καθρέφτη, 
ένα ενισχύοντας γυαλί και οπτικό καλώδιο ινών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un periscopio del 
prisma, un periscopio del espejo, un espejo dental, una lupa y un 
cable óptico de la fibra.</string>
